EmailTemplate.description: Email that informs the customer that our participants list is paying.
EmailTemplate.name: SCE-EN DATA DISCLOSURE CONFIRMATION COSTS
EmailTemplate.subject: CASS Data Disclosure: Acceptation of costs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
The information you have requested is a paying service and will be charged through a BTA, to be included in one or your upcoming CASS statements. The corresponding invoice will be available in myIATA (www.myiata.org/ssp).
Before we send you the file you are interested in, may we ask you to accept the corresponding charge. Our fares are available in our web portal, www.iata.org/europe/cs (click on Document and Form Centre).
In case you need further information from IATA, please do not hesitate to login a new query via our Customer Portal: www.iata.com/europe/cs. These queries will be answered with the highest priority.
Yours Sincerely
{!Case.OwnerFullName} Service Centre Europe International Air Transport Association www.iata.org/europe/cs
